meanings.sent1: The nonusing toy was left untouched in the corner.
meanings.sent2: She felt nonusing when she forgot her phone at home.
meanings.sent3: The nonusing remote control played hide and seek with the TV.
meanings.sent4: His nonusing skills in basketball made him stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonusing garden tools rusted away in the shed.

meanings.definition: The act of not using something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonusing of the computer surprised her friends.
meanings.sent2: The nonusing of the old building led to its deterioration.
meanings.sent3: The nonusing of the umbrella on a sunny day made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His nonusing of the map turned the journey into an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The nonusing of the pen left the paper blank.
